title: 01/12/21 DPS Hour 3 Bruce Arians
itunes:title: 01/12/21 DPS Hour 3 Bruce Arians
description:
Bruce Arians tells Dan how he gets along with Tom Brady. Bruce coached 2 years at Alabama, but says he still watched the National Championship Game as a coach and not a fan.
